channel.title: 2019 on lecta collecta
channel.description: Recent content in 2019 on lecta collecta

item.title: Excerpts from 2019 reading
item.description: Take me to the first quote from: Fortress Besieged by Qian Zhongshu, Nothing Is True and Everything Is Possible: The Surreal Heart of the New Russia by Peter Pomerantsev, Stoner by John Williams;John Mcgahern, Heart of a Dog by Mikhail Bulgakov, Conversations of Socrates by Classics) (Xenophon, Discourses, Fragments, Handbook by Robin Hard; Christopher Gill, The Rise and Fall of Athens: Nine Greek Lives by Classics) (Plutarch, The Rise of Rome by Penguin Classics) (Plutarch, The Satyricon by Petronius, On the Nature of the Gods by Marcus Tullius Cicero, Homo Deus: A Brief History of Tomorrow by Yuval Noah Harari, The Cabaret of Plants by Richard Mabey, The Wind in the Willows by Kenneth Grahame, Talking to My Daughter About the Economy by Yanis Varoufakis, Empire of Things by Frank Trentmann, Adults in the Room by Yanis Varoufakis, Natasha’s Dance by Orlando Figes
